code: import React from"react";import{usePreferences}from"../context/PreferencesContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const dictionary={vi:{title:"Xác nhận đăng xuất",message:"Bạn có chắc chắn muốn đăng xuất khỏi tài khoản không?",cancel:"Hủy",confirm:"Đăng xuất"},en:{title:"Sign out?",message:"Are you sure you want to sign out of your account?",cancel:"Cancel",confirm:"Sign out"}};const LogoutConfirmModal=_ref=>{let{show,onConfirm,onCancel}=_ref;const{language}=usePreferences();const text=dictionary[language]||dictionary.vi;if(!show)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-backdrop",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:text.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-body",children:text.message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-secondary",onClick:onCancel,children:text.cancel}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-danger",onClick:onConfirm,children:text.confirm})]})]})});};export default LogoutConfirmModal;
